title: 4 Reasons Your AI Agent Needs Code Interpreter
author: Vasek Mlejnsky
description: We will see code interpreters powering even more AI agents and apps as a part of the new ecosystem being built around LLMs, where a code interpreter represents a crucial part of an agent’s brain.
cntitle: 人工智能代理需要代码解释器的 4 个原因
cndescription: 随着围绕 LLM 构建的新生态系统的一部分，我们将看到代码解释器为更多 AI 代理和应用程序提供支持，其中代码解释器代表了代理大脑的关键部分。
